author: Jackie Hague
content:
Hired a bouncy castle from DB entertainment  for my daughters birthday.. it was delivered promptly at 8am by a very friendly, helpful and informative guy. (Didnâ€™t get his name unfortunately) the castle was spotless and in perfect condition.
We hired the castle until the next morning when it was collected by 8.30am.
I would definitely recommend this DB entertainment  and would not hesitate to use them again.
